mapper.select: select keyword,sum(frequency) sum from keywordPaper where year between #{beginYear} and #{endYear} group by keyword order by sum desc limit ${size};
select keyword,year,sum(frequency) sum from keywordPaper where keyword = #{keyword} group by year ;
select p.paperID ,title,p.year,authors,p.meeting,link,abstractContent from paper p join keywordPaper k on p.paperID = k.paperID where keyword = #{keyword};
select p.paperID ,title,p.year,authors,p.meeting,link,abstractContent from paper p join keywordPaper k on p.paperID = k.paperID where keyword = #{keyword} limit ${begin},${num};
select keyword ,frequency,k.year,k.meeting from paper p join keywordPaper k on p.paperID = k.paperID where p.paperID = #{paperID};
